item.description:
Get ready for the Couch to 5K with new sneakers! I know I need a new pair and I can’t wait for this event.

Our sponsor, The Greater Boston Running Companyis hosting a Gait Analysis and Proper Footwear Shopping Clinic for the SSFMG.  GBRC will be hosting the event in conjunction with their Thursday Run Group night.  Go for a short run or just hang out at the store.  You’ll learn about proper biomechanics, what your individual foot strike is and what type of running shoes would best fit your individual needs whether you’re a runner, walker or a casual gym person.  With the help of experience fitters and gait analyzers, try on shoes from a variety of brands until you find the perfect recommended fit!
GBRC will be offering 20% off footwear and apparel purchased at the event.  This is one fun event you will not want to miss.

Gait Analysis and Shopping Clinic
Thursday July 14th, 6-8pm.
Greater Boston Running Company
94 Derby Street Shoppes
Suite 213
Hingham, MA 02043
781-749-3800
www.greaterbost onrunningcompan y.com

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Gait Analysis & Footwear Clinic WITH DISCOUNT!!!
